title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 71.8 - Amendment of pleadings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 71.8 - Amendment of pleadings

State Regulations

The petition may be amended at any time prior to the
service of the answer. After an answer has been served or the time within which
to serve an answer has elapsed, a pleading may be amended only by leave of the
board. Any application for leave to amend made prior to the hearing shall be
made upon at least 10 days' prior written notice and must be accompanied by the
proposed amended pleading. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
71.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
